title: [SOLVED]820-2530 dead after HDD->SSD, Green light ok.
message:
Hi guys,

A friend tried to upgrade to SSD and he did something that killed this mbp,

I noticed that PP3V3_S5 was missing and that U7200 gets really hot. I replaced u7200 and it gets hot again. There seems to be no short on that line and diode mode at L7220 measures 0.089.

If I connect the magsafe and after U7200 gets hot (10-15 secs) this line gives a zero diode mode reading (magsafe disconnected of course).

Since there is no apparent short injecting voltage would be pointless?? Any ideas?

br,
george

title: [SOLVED]820-2530 dead after HDD->SSD, Green light ok.
message: The short will be on the LDO outputs pin 3, 8 or 17.

title: [SOLVED]820-2530 dead after HDD->SSD, Green light ok.
message:
hi duke,

already checked that and there are no shorts there.. BUT.. I missed that my friend knocked off C7271 :)) - problem solved.

thanks!
george
